title: How to Make a Rich Almond Cream Pudding

steps.headline: Place the saucepan on a medium heat.
steps.description: When hot, pour the clarified butter or ghee into it. Stir with a wooden spoon until it has melted.

steps.headline: Pour the cream into the melted butter and mix well.
Cover the saucepan with the lid and leave the cream and melted butter mixture on a medium heat for one to three minutes.
steps.description: Stir occasionally until the cream and butter has separated.

steps.headline: Add the almonds and cardamom and mix well.
Cook with the lid on the saucepan for around 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the sugar and mix well.
steps.description: Cook for another 2 to 3 minutes or until all of the sugar has dissolved.

steps.headline: Add the cardamom powder and mix well.
Continue to cook over a low heat, stirring the mixture until you get the consistency you like.
steps.description: For instance, you may prefer a runny consistency or a paste like consistency.

steps.headline: Remove from the heat and pour into serving bowl.

text: Place the saucepan on a medium heat. When hot, pour the clarified butter or ghee into it. Stir with a wooden spoon until it has melted. Pour the cream into the melted butter and mix well.  Cover the saucepan with the lid and leave the cream and melted butter mixture on a medium heat for one to three minutes. Stir occasionally until the cream and butter has separated. Add the almonds and cardamom and mix well.  Cook with the lid on the saucepan for around 2 to 3 minutes.  Add the sugar and mix well. Cook for another 2 to 3 minutes or until all of the sugar has dissolved. Add the cardamom powder and mix well.  Continue to cook over a low heat, stirring the mixture until you get the consistency you like. For instance, you may prefer a runny consistency or a paste like consistency. Remove from the heat and pour into serving bowl.
